item.description:
So it's time again...last time was so much fun, we had to do it again. Join us for a nice brunch over at West End Johnnies with the lovely sounds of The Conscious Band, playing your favorite reggae hits.

As this is a dining meetup, I will need people to be certain they are coming if they are going to RSVP. This is one of the most popular brunches around town, and so seating is at a premium. So if 10 people RSVP, we will need 10 people to show up, out of respect for the group and the venue. It looks bad for the group if only 4 show up, but we reserved space for 10.

So with those particulars out of the way, let's enjoy a relaxing brunch with food, drink, reggae music, and great conversation with other members.
item.name: Sunday Reggae Brunch
